content: {"locationId": "912", "organizationId": "790", "name": "Geneseo-Atkinson Food Pantry", "address1": "620 West Main Street", "address2": null, "city": "Geneseo", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "61254", "country": null, "phone": "309-944-3165", "phoneExt": null, "website": "https://www.geneseofoodpantry.org/", "latitude": "41.4471639", "longitude": "-90.165635", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Other", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Henry, TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  Geneseo School District", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Christian mission of the Geneseo-Atkinson Food Pantry is to provide food, clothing, and short-term emergency assistance for families and individuals in need.  We aim to serve the whole person, striving to positively impact our guests\u2019 total sense of wellness \u2013 economic, education, health, environment, and community \u2013 with the ambition of empowering our guests to live more functional, effective, and healthy lives.  Responding to the needs of all our \u201cleast brothers and sisters.\u201d (Matthew 25:40)", "notes": "Geneseo-Atkinson Food Pantry provides food, clothing, and emergency monetary assistance to its qualifying guests.  We are a 100% guest-choice pantry.  Food can be obtained anytime we are open.  (e.g., There is no specific food distribution day.)", "contactName": "Michael Sigwalt", "contactPhone": "309-944-3165", "contactEmail": "geneseopantry@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Online Ordering, Other, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "Gluten Free, Vegetarian", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Other, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 14, "regionName": "River Bend Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "27f2b82c-b145-46d8-a570-4c990f38833b.png", "website": "http://riverbendfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Monday 9:00 AM-7:00 PM", "Monday 9:00 AM-7:00 PM", "Monday 9:00 AM-7:00 PM", "Monday 9:00 AM-7:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Friday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Friday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Friday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": [{"locationSpecialHoursId": 5386, "locationId": 912, "specialDate": "2025-09-01T00:00:00", "startTime": null, "endTime": null, "startTimeDescr": null, "endTimeDescr": null, "closedInd": true, "notes": "Labor Day", "addDateTime": "2024-07-29T20:52:56.227", "addUserName": "geneseopantry@gmail.com", "updateDateTime": null, "updateUserName": null}]}
